title: Racy Affair Saga Between Jeff Bezos and Enquirer Reaches Final Chapter
sub_head: Probes by federal officials on phone-hack, extortion claims haven’t led to public action
body:
In 2019, Amazon.com Inc. founder Jeff Bezos accused the National Enquirer of attempting to extort him with embarrassing texts and photos, and his security team suggested that Saudi Arabia could have gleaned this data by hacking his phone.
Probes by the U.S. government haven’t led to any public action on either front.
